channel.title: Please help me i dont understand this at all?
channel.description:
ok like everytime i try to connect to my erver it doesnt allow me to but yet its still allowing oher players to connect to it bcuz i can se they are from looking at the comand promt box that runs the server. And anyways after it tells me "error connecting to server" ill go into my router page and like re-portforward if you wanna call i that cuz i put in the port 43594 and also and then the other information im supposed to and then i click apply changes and the after thats done configuring it will allow me to connect to my server :confused: i dont get it and i have to do that like everytime now. It just started doing this today ?
please help me thanks,smerf45

item.title: Please help me i dont understand this at all?
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

If other players can log in correctly, then you portforwarded correctly. I think your problem is the client you are using to connect.

Go into your client.java for the client you are using and search this:

no-ip

and change the full ip address in there to 127.0.0.1 and you should be able to connect.

Read full topic
